mainText:
Dear Apple,

As a Chinese college student who enjoys Apple's product, admires Apple, and loves Mr. jobs, I was so depressed when I heard he was gone.

What he left to us are surely more than those amazing products developed by Apple. This fantastic human will continue inspiring us a long long way. He is
 more than phenomenal. Carry on, Apple.
header: Remembering Steve from a Chinese people
author: Noah
